Articles.Content:
The Kerbal Sukhoi Su-35 is a highly manoeuvrable and capable plane. Large control surfaces and offset thrust allow the sukhoi to manoeuvre effectively when under power but also glide well without the risk of major stalling which is prevented through the balance of the centres of lift and mass. Presented here are two variants:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The atmospheric designation of the Su-35 has a TWR of 2.0 allowing it to reach 400m/s at sea level. Its offset engines and large control surfaces allow for fast and instantaneous manoeuvres

https://mega.co.nz/#!qEknxAzI!BZQ2KkwgUDtInK9XocDDgKG5zs2pkL008_rb2H8IGgc

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The orbital designation of the Su-35 has twin rapier-precooler engines allowing it to reach orbit with approximately 200 delta/v remaining (without droptanks), plenty for docking to an orbital station.

https://mega.co.nz/#!vIlnQbzB!fecSu7CDBzSqBIA_V25VyDu5aPVit6e9OshyETmp2uc

Edited May 22, 2015 by landfish2
Very pretty plane. Do you use any mods?

The only graphics mod I use is scatterer

Other than that I use engineer, intake build aid and kerbal joint reinforcement (for larger craft)
